mapper.select: SELECT PRIVILEGE_ID, ACT_DEF_ID, NODE_ID, PRIVILEGE_MODE, USER_TYPE, CMP_NAMES, CMP_IDS FROM BPM_NODE_PRIVILEGE WHERE ACT_DEF_ID = #{actDefId} AND NODE_ID = #{nodeId}
SELECT PRIVILEGE_ID, ACT_DEF_ID, NODE_ID, PRIVILEGE_MODE, USER_TYPE, CMP_NAMES, CMP_IDS FROM BPM_NODE_PRIVILEGE WHERE PRIVILEGE_ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BPM_NODE_PRIVILEGE( PRIVILEGE_ID, ACT_DEF_ID, NODE_ID, PRIVILEGE_MODE, USER_TYPE, CMP_NAMES, CMP_IDS ) values( #{privilegeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilegeMode,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cmpNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmpIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BPM_NODE_PRIVILEGE WHERE ACT_DEF_ID=#{actDefId} AND NODE_ID=#{nodeId}
